div.div:
(1) Host allocated MSI-x Interrupt
with Remappable format

div.div:
(3) IOMMU sets bit 30 in PIR
and sends NV

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 188px; height: 1px; padding-top: 59px; margin-left: 287px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Times New Roman; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font:
Notification vector (NV) triggers
interrupt evaluation thus core delivers interrupt vector = 30 to the guest without vmexit
